author: smishura
msg: ([jdktools] support setting JVM arguments in unit tests)

author: mturyn
msg: Put in less buggy setVisibleAttribute() method; now it just moves the table offscreen---it was seeming-impossible to get decent behaviour across browsers when an initially-hidden table was desired, the browser seemed to need to have the object visible, if not on-screen, when it was setting it up.  If it was invisible, would often miss all but the last column when the table's visibility were restored.

author: ningjiang
msg: Replaced pom.xml's related rt-transports-http module to rt-transport-http2, and reopened some systest

author: tomdz
msg: Added a check as to whether data can be migrated when a table is altered
